00028 
00029 /* MD5 context. */
00030 
00031 typedef struct {
00032   UINT4 state[4];                                   /* state (ABCD) */
00033   UINT4 count[2];        /* number of bits, modulo 2^64 (lsb first) */
00034   unsigned char buffer[64];                         /* input buffer */
00035 
00036 } MD5_CTX; 
00037 
00038 void MD5Init PROTO_LIST ((MD5_CTX *));
00039 void MD5Update PROTO_LIST
00040 ((MD5_CTX *, unsigned char *, unsigned int)); 
00041 
00042 void MD5Final PROTO_LIST ((unsigned char [16], MD5_CTX *));
